title: Kubernetes A to Z Course
description: A serie of scenarios that will teach you how to use Kubernetes

courses.title: Create a simple cluster
courses.description: Create your first cluster with minikube and deploy a web application with kubectl

courses.title: Create a simple cluster using manifest configuration files
courses.description: Create a cluster and deploy a web application with kubectl

courses.title: Create a persistent volume and database
courses.description: Create a cluster with persistent volume and database backed web application
